channel.title: Java Bug System
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [JDK-8303540] Eliminate unnecessary reference to javac internal class
item.description: in the standard doclet, `Utils` imports `com.sun.tools.javac.model.JavacTypes` when direct use of the public super type would be enough,
item.summary: Eliminate unnecessary reference to javac internal class

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
A pull request was submitted for review.
URL: https://git.openjdk.org/jdk/pull/12844
Date: 2023-03-03 00:24:22 +0000

Changeset: f64ed09e
Author: Jonathan Gibbons <jjg@openjdk.org>
Date: 2023-03-06 22:13:52 +0000
URL: https://git.openjdk.org/jdk/commit/f64ed09e9a674a38f03f1e27e56fb19d72939ba1

Other references seem reasonable:

$ grep -r com.sun.tools.javac open/src/jdk.javadoc/share/classes/jdk/javadoc/internal/doclets
open/src/jdk.javadoc/share/classes/jdk/javadoc/internal/doclets/toolkit/util/StandardDocFileFactory.java:import com.sun.tools.javac.util.Assert;
open/src/jdk.javadoc/share/classes/jdk/javadoc/internal/doclets/toolkit/util/Utils.java:import com.sun.tools.javac.model.JavacTypes;
open/src/jdk.javadoc/share/classes/jdk/javadoc/internal/doclets/toolkit/util/JavaScriptScanner.java:import com.sun.tools.javac.util.DefinedBy;
open/src/jdk.javadoc/share/classes/jdk/javadoc/internal/doclets/toolkit/util/JavaScriptScanner.java:import com.sun.tools.javac.util.DefinedBy.Api;
open/src/jdk.javadoc/share/classes/jdk/javadoc/internal/doclets/toolkit/taglets/snippet/MarkupParser.java: // Parsing machinery is adapted from com.sun.tools.javac.parser.DocCommentParser:
open/src/jdk.javadoc/share/classes/jdk/javadoc/internal/doclets/toolkit/resources/releases/element-list-10.txt:com.sun.tools.javac
open/src/jdk.javadoc/share/classes/jdk/javadoc/internal/doclets/toolkit/resources/releases/element-list-9.txt:com.sun.tools.javac
open/src/jdk.javadoc/share/classes/jdk/javadoc/internal/doclets/toolkit/WorkArounds.java:import com.sun.tools.javac.code.Flags;
